meanings.definition: A person who plays a pipe instrument.
meanings.sent1: The pipers played beautiful music at the festival.
meanings.sent2: The talented pipers entertained the crowd with their melodies.
meanings.sent3: The pipers decided to have a musical duel to see who was the best.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the pipers' music filled the air like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the pipers' enchanting tunes.

meanings.definition: A small hard seed in a fruit.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally bit into a piper while eating her apple.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully removed the piper from the peach before serving.
meanings.sent3: The piper in the orange surprised her as she took a bite.
meanings.sent4: The piper in the fruit was as hard as a tiny pebble.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to break your tooth on a hidden piper in the fruit.

meanings.definition: A small bird known for its distinctive call.
meanings.sent1: The colorful pipers chirped happily in the garden.
meanings.sent2: We woke up to the sweet songs of the pipers outside our window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the pipers but failed every time.
meanings.sent4: The piper's call echoed through the forest, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: I love listening to the cheerful melodies of the pipers in the morning.
